snippet: The N.F.L. received 1.7 million texts asking about a contest that doesn't start until next season.
abstract: The N.F.L. received 1.7 million texts asking about a contest that doesn't start until next season.
lead_paragraph: Dozens of ads during the Super Bowl guided viewers to post a Twitter message, "like" a Facebook page or log on to a corporate Web site. But only one ad asked viewers to send a text message.

headline.main: A Super Bowl Text-Message Ad Reaps Big Returns
